entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:23 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
